text: Browns Run is a small tributary to South Fork Tenmile Creek in southwestern Pennsylvania. The stream rises in northeastern Greene County and flows south- southeast entering South Fork Tenmile Creek at Mather, Pennsylvania. The watershed is roughly 31% agricultural, 61% forested and the rest is other uses. ==References== Category:Rivers of Pennsylvania Category:Tributaries of the Monongahela River Category:Rivers of Greene County, Pennsylvania
title: Browns Run (South Fork Tenmile Creek tributary)
